   Graduation Gift Guide: Electronics For Grads
 
Graduation gifts should be cool, and nothing says "cool" like electronics. Need help sending that hard-working graduate out into the world in style? Consumer Guide has done some of the homework for you. This cheat sheet gift guide will give you some great ideas for a pretty cool electronic gift that says, "Congratulations, graduate!"
 
Also at HowStuffWorks 

How ASIMO Works - ASIMO, which stands for Advanced Step in Innovative Mobility, is the most advanced
humanoid robot in the world. Find out how ASIMO was developed and what it can
do.
 
Can I use my cell phone as a credit card? - In the near future, your cell phone could automatically act
a credit card or debit card wherever you go, thanks to a technology called NFC. Learn how NFC phones and payment
stations work.
 

How Wireless Power Works - You probably have a few spaghetti-like power-cord tangles
around your home. Find out how methods of wireless power transmission could cut
the clutter or lead to clean sources of electricity.
   
This Week's Video 

How Xavix Works - Want a video game that gets your kids off the couch? Xavix
lets you play all kinds of sports, from baseball to boxing, on your television
screen. See how Xavix technology works in this HowStuffWorks video.
